org.latency4j

Class MonitorFactoryStaticHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.latency4j.MonitorFactoryStaticHandle

  • public class MonitorFactoryStaticHandle
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides a static handle to a default monitor factory implementation. It initialises the factory via the path taken from the system property Latency4JConstants.CONFIG_FILE_VM_PROP if specified, or from the default configuration file if present. However, an additional override method is provided to force initialisation from an InputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • getMonitor

        public static LatencyMonitor getMonitor(java.lang.String workCategory)

        Returns the monitor for the given category of work. This method is simply a convenience proxy to the method MonitorFactory.getMonitor(String).

        Parameters:
        workCategory - The category of work to be monitored.
        Returns:
        An existing monitor if one exists or has already been created for the specified category, else a new monitor instance is created and returned.

      • initializeFrom

        public static void initializeFrom(java.io.InputStream stream)

        Forces initialisation of the internal monitor factory from the given stream.

        Parameters:
        stream - The stream from which the factory configuration should be read.
        Throws:
        Latency4JException - If an exception occurs accessing or reading from the given stream.

      • getMonitorFactory

        public AsynchronousLatencyMonitorFactory getMonitorFactory()

        Accessor method for the field monitorFactory.

        Returns:
        A reference to the field monitorFactory.
